name: Rove Or Treat
description:
As Humanity's ever reaching gaze grew, so did their desire to reach and explore beyond their planet. And so a new goal was set: Mars , The Red Planet was stirring with mystery. Scientists now having the technology to survey this wondrous ruby of space, sent a rover to collect data.

You are the Opportunity Rover. Your Mission: To explore as much as possible before your fuel runs out.

Let this be the beginning of humanity's exploration of the cosmos!

This game is a submission for Curdle Jam #7, the theme of which is "Opportunity Knocks"!

Programming, Music, & Design - FunkyMonk

Art - BluInk

Voice Acting - Oldman Deckard
